ComicInfo.Summary:
A crowd of gawkers gathered around a hostage situation are shocked when Youngblood sends Shaft, their only member without powers, to deal with the situation.
The Covenant puts Dutch and his new systems upgrade through a test run by seriously trying to kill him.
Crypt breaks into the Ragnarok Government Research Center to gain more information about Prophet.
ComicInfo.Title: Just Talkin' Bout Shaft
ComicInfo.Writer: Kurt Busiek,Mary Bierbaum,Robert Place Napton,Tom Bierbaum,Keith Giffen,Robert Napton,Kurt Busiek,Keith Giffen,Tom Bierbaum,Mary Bierbaum,Robert Napton
